column4: just finished installing ubuntu 5.04 ( wich is so nice btw) the 64bit version, so i was trying to recompile some 2.6.9 kernel when i found out i dont have ncurses-devel installed! now, the apt does not find such package to install ( and i have universe enabled ) and now im stuck ! help plz
i saw it today too! and i was like pimp
